name: backr
description: Backr is an innovative crowdfunding web application designed to connect passionate creators, entrepreneurs, and changemakers with a global community of backers. Whether you're launching a product, funding a creative endeavor, or supporting a social cause, Backr provides the tools and visibility you need to bring your vision to life # Features: o User-Friendly Campaign Creation:   - Launch your campaign with customizable templates, engaging visuals, and compelling storytelling tools.
